item.title: Black Republican calls for total, permanent abolition of DEI: 'I want to earn every opportunity on merit'
item.description: Black Republican U.S. Rep. Wesley Hunt of Texas called for the full and permanent abolition of diversity, equity, and inclusion ideology.

item.title: Critics warn Minnesota legislation now taking effect is setting up the 'next billion-dollar fraud'
item.description: Minnesota paid leave law takes effect Jan. 1, granting workers up to 20 weeks of benefits, but critics say the program could be exploited for fraud.

item.title: President Donald Trump shares his New Year's resolution
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said his New Year's resolution is "Peace on Earth" after he was asked on December 31, 2025 if he had a New Year's resoluti...

item.title: New York City is about to test Mamdani’s progressive economic vision
item.description: NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's progressive agenda includes city-owned grocery stores, free buses and rent freezes, testing ambitious policies.

item.title: Socialist Mayor Mamdani inaugurated alongside Bernie Sanders and AOC on New Year’s Day
item.description: Thirty-four-year-old socialist Zohran Mamdani to become NYC mayor with AOC, Bernie Sanders at inauguration, after his controversial campaign produced ...
